title: These champions are NOT assasins!
body:
{{champion:245}} He is a melee mage, not an assasin. He is mage that is good for his AreaOfEffect damge, and his CC. He's not so much about picking off a single target but is good at turning team fights around entirely.

{{champion:64}}  This is a light fighter

{{champion:39}} Another light fighter

{{champion:92}} Again a light fighter

{{champion:5}} Also a light fighter

{{champion:157}} A melee carry

{{champion:80}} Another light fighter.

{{champion:114}} Is still a light fighter

{{champion:103}} A ranged AoE spamming mage.

So tired of people misusing the word "assassin" .
